name: Art Rush (Rent, Galeaz, Wongboy)
description:
Work on your own or with another player to manage your very own art store! Manage your time and stay organized as customers file in, each with a custom prop and color combination request. From bold blue duckies to zesty red ice cubes, players are able to choose from a variety of props and colors in their store. Do your best to retrieve the correct item and color, then paint it before handing it off to the corresponding customer. Be sure to wash your paintbrush at the sink before switching colors, lest you mix your paint! Also, do try to catch that pesky fly that's been buzzing around, it's bothering the customers...

Play singleplayer, local multiplayer, or online through private rooms!

NOTE: currently, players are unable to win in online multiplayer

Controls:

Player 1 

  • W/A/S/D to move
  • E to interact
  • Q to paint
  • left ctrl or space to dash

Player 2

  • I/J/K/L to move
  • O to interact
  • P to paint
  • "." (period key) to dash

Team:

Anthony Wong - Programmer

Gabriela Diaz - Programmer, UI

Isaac Corona - Programmer

Renee Tran - Programmer, artist
